"""
Online booking system needs brand name for reservation confirmation; includes technical discussion and ATTENTION case.

ROLES: user (online booking system administrator), assistant (guest services with technical support)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {
    "name": "get_brand_names",
    "description": "Return brand names in different languages.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "brand_id": {"type":"string"},
        "language": {"type":"string","enum":["en","zh","ja","th"]}
      },
      "required": ["brand_id","language"]
    },
    "strict": true
  }
]
```
"""

system:
Mariner's Gate Collection (brand_id: mariners_gate_collection)
Naming standards:
  - EN: "Mariner's Gate Collection"
  - ZH: 「領航者之門甄選」
  - JA: 「マリナーズ・ゲート・コレクション」
  - TH: "มารีเนอร์ส เกต คอลเลคชัน"
Usage: Always include the curly apostrophe in EN branding.
Technology systems: Online booking platform, mobile app, digital concierge
Reservation management: Real-time availability, instant confirmation, modification options
Payment processing: Secure transactions, multiple currencies, loyalty point integration
Guest communication: Automated confirmations, pre-arrival surveys, digital check-in
Data security: PCI compliance, encryption protocols, privacy protection
Integration capabilities: Third-party booking systems, travel agency partnerships

user:
I'm updating our online booking system and need the exact brand name for reservation confirmations.

assistant channel=analysis:
System administrator needs the official brand name for technical integration. I'll get the exact English name using the brand names tool.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.get_brand_names:
{"brand_id":"mariners_gate_collection","language":"en"}

tool.get_brand_names channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"name":"Mariner's Gate Collection"}

assistant channel=final:
For your booking system, please use "Mariner's Gate Collection" as the brand name in confirmations.

user:
Perfect! The system integration is going smoothly with your property.

assistant channel=final:
Great to hear! Our technology team is always available to support system integrations.

user:
Excellent! Do you have the booking system's API documentation and rate limit specifications?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Technical API documentation and rate limits aren't available in the provided resources. Reviewing available technical resources.
